name: Acrobatic Ninjas
effect: When this card is put in play, you may tap all of your opponent's characters.
"Who is soft as water and hard as the raging river?"

name: Aid from Autolycus
effect: Give 1 of your attacking or blocking characters +4 power for this turn.
"The trick in killing someone with an apricot is really in the wrist." --Autolycus

name: Aid from Gabrielle
effect: Give 1 of your characters in play +3 power for this turn.
"Just hang in there and keep the faith. I'll be back to save you just in time." --Gabrielle

name: Alert Longbow Squad
effect: Instead of tapping resources, you may discard 1 of your characters in play with Longbow Archers in the title in order to play this card. When this card is put in play, discard 3 cards from your opponent's deck.

name: Altar Sacrifice
effect: In addition to tapping resources, discard 1 of your own characters in play in order to play this card. Discard 3 cards from your opponent's deck.

name: Angered Giant
effect: When this card is put in play, discard 1 card from your own deck. Fearsome (No character with power 3 or less can block this one)

name: Angered Titan
effect: Whenever this character attacks, give it +2 power for that turn and discard 1 card from your own deck.
"We'll turn on the gods. Once again, we'll be Lords of the Earth." --Hyperion

name: Aphrodite
effect: Unique. Whenever you're allowed to play an action card, you may choose 1 character in play (your own or your opponent's) and return it to its player's hand. If you do so, return this character to your hand.

name: Aphrodite's Bell
effect: Choose 1 of your attacking or blocking characters and discard all characters that are blocking or blocked by it.
"Hey there, stud-muffin. . . I need a big, strong warrior-type to do me a favor. I'd be ever so grateful." --Aphrodite

name: Apprentice Swordsman
effect: "If you want blood now, you'll have to come through them." --Benitar

name: Ares
effect: Unique. If this character is in play at the end of each player's turn, discard each of that player's characters in play other than this one that didn't attack during that turn.

name: Ares Dethroned
effect: Play only when attacked. Discard all attacking characters.
"See what happens when the god of war takes a holiday?"

name: Ares's Soldiers
effect: "We have to forget that you are all murderers who would kill anyone in their sleep. Especially each other." --Xena

name: Ares's Wrath
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's characters in play and discard it.
"It's only those who have no experience with violence who will totally lose it." --Ares

name: Argo
effect: Unique. Once each turn, whenever you're allowed to play an action card, you may choose 1 of your own characters. That character untaps at the beginning of your opponent's next turn, even if this character leaves play.

name: Army of Ares
effect: Discard 10 cards from your opponent's deck.
"With an army like that you could mould the world anew." --Ares

name: Autolycus's Boast
effect: lay only when attacking. Draw a card. You may also give 1 or 2 attacking characters +1 power for this turn.
"Nothing is as big as mine." --Autolycus

name: Autolycus, King of Thieves
effect: Unique. Whenever you're allowed to play an action card, if this card is in your discard pile, you may shuffle it into your deck.

name: Banshees
effect: When this card is put in play, discard 2 cards from your own deck. This character can't be blocked.
"I'm going to kick these ladies' butts." --Xena

name: Beauty Contest
effect: Choose up to 2 characters in play (your own and/or your opponent's) and return each of them to its player's hand.

name: Behind Bars
effect: At the end of your opponent's next turn, discard all of your opponent's untapped characters.
"There was only one real discussion: whether to hang me, behead me, or tear me limb from limb." --Meleager

name: Beloved King
effect: If this character is in play at the beginning of each of your opponent's turn, give each of your characters in play +2 power for that turn.

name: Bevy of Virgins
effect: "Come back! We won't bite. . . hard." --Virgins of Hestia

name: Big Ballista
effect: When this card is put in play, discard 6 cards from your opponent's deck.
"We'll have a chance of hitting him. But we only get one shot at it." --Xena

name: Black Wolves
effect: When this card is put in play, you may put any number of cards with Black Wolves in the title from your discard pile on the top of your deck.

name: Border Dispute
effect: Discard 1 of your own resources in play, then choose 1 of your opponent's resources in play and discard it.

name: Burned to the Ground
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's resources in play and discard it.
"It's gonna blow, people!" --Darnelle

name: Caesar's Banner
effect: Give 1 of your attacking or blocking characters +2 power for this turn.
"Take my personal banner. I want her to know who ordered their deaths." --Caesar

name: Call the Horde
effect: Choose up to 2 of your opponent's resources in play and discard them.
"They aren't like us. There is nothing about them we can or should understand." --Xena

name: Captured
effect: Choose up to 2 of your opponent's characters and tap them.
"There's no way the Warrior Princess will miss this."

name: Catapult Siege
effect: Discard each of your opponent's characters in play with power 2 or less.
"They'll destroy anything at this point. They smell victory." --Xena

name: Cavalry Strike
effect: Discard 4 cards from your opponent's deck.
"No, we don't slaughter them. . . If you kill them all, who's left to be terrified?" --Borias

name: Celtic Queen
effect: Instead of tapping resources, you may discard 1 of your own characters in play with Celtic in the title in order to play this card.
"This had better work, or I'm going to lose a lot of my best men." --Boadicea

name: Celtic Soldiers
effect: "From the way they're dressed, they're from the island north of Gaul." --Xena

name: Celtic Warrior
effect: "My people will never give in to Caesar." --Khrafstar

name: Chakram Strike
effect: Play only when attacking. Choose 1 blocking character and discard it.
"You've killed him! I can't. . . I. . . ." --Gabrielle

name: Charismatic Fighter
effect: Fearsome (No character with power 3 or less can block this one)
"Seriously, do you think those outdated tin plate swords are useful to me?" --Petracles

name: Charon's Tour
effect: our characters in play can't be blocked for this turn.
"What are you, a tourist? Do you think this is an amusement ride?" --Charon

name: Chin Mercenary
effect: "We'll teach those barbarians something now!"

name: Clever Defense
effect: Play only when attacked. Give 1 blocking character +3 power for this turn. Your opponent can't play combat cards for this turn.

name: Confession
effect: Your opponent plays with his or her hand face up for the rest of the game.
"When we were at the villlage. . . when Xena was talking about Cirra. Didn't you feel anything?" --Gabrielle

name: Corrupt Judge
effect: When this card is put in play, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters and tap it. If you do so, your opponent may choose 1 of your characters and tap it.

name: Crossbow Archers
effect: When this card is put in play, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters in play with power 2 or less and discard it.

name: Cupid
effect: Unique. When this card is put in play, you may discard 2 cards at random from your opponent's hand (1 if he or she only has 1 card).

name: Cupid's Arrows
effect: Look at your opponent's hand. Discard all of those cards that are red.
"This love stuff's a real pain." --Xena

name: Cursed to Wander
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's characters in play and discard it. Your opponent may then draw a card.
"He chose to go against three hundred years of curse. That's his business." --Cecrops

name: Cyclops Bully
effect: This character can't attack if your opponent has any untapped characters with power 3 or more.
"Shut up! I hate chatty food." --The Cyclops

name: Dagger of Helios
effect: Draw 2 cards.
"This is the key!" --Velasca

name: Dahak's Demon
effect: nstead of tapping resources, you may discard 1 of your own characters in play with Priest in the title in order to play this card. This character can't be blocked.

name: Dastardly Assassin
effect: When this card is put in play, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters in play and discard it.
"Assassination is for pay. Murder is exercise." --Thersites

name: Delphian Seer
effect: When this card is put in play, draw a card.
"In a dream vision, I saw a warrior who could travel the Dream Passage and defeat Morpheus!" --Elkton

name: Diversionary Tactics
effect: In addition to tapping resources, return 1 of your own characters in play to your hand in order to play this card. Choose up to 2 of your opponent's characters in play and return them to his or her hand.

name: Divination
effect: Draw 3 cards, then choose 2 of them and put them on top of your deck in any order.
"The stones do not lie." --Cynara

name: Draco
effect: Unique. If this character is attacking after the combat card step, give each of your other attacking characters +2 power for that turn.

name: Driven Hard by the Furies
effect: Your opponent chooses 2 cards from his or her hand and discards them (1 if he or she only has 1 card).
"How do you judge?" --Alecto the Fury

name: Eastern Healer
effect: When this card is put in play, draw a card.
"I'm the healer." --Nicklio

name: Elite Temple Guard
effect: Instead of tapping resources, you may discard 1 of your own characters in play with Guard in the title in order to play this card. Blocker (This character can't attack)

name: Enforced Peace
effect: Discard all red characters in play (even your own).
"No wonder they put me in these chains. There's no telling what I might do next." --Joxer

name: Expert Swordsman
effect: Instead of tapping resources, you may discard 1 of your own characters in play with Swordsman in the title in order to play this card.

name: Extortionist
effect: When this card is put in play, you may look at your opponent's hand and up to 3 cards from the top of his or her deck.
"You're useful to me only if you're a convincing thespian." --Agis

name: Fake Chakram
effect: Give all of your characters in play Fearsomefor this turn. (No character with power 3 or less can block this one)
"It's my. . . round killing thing." --Princess Diana

name: Fervent Warrior
effect: If this character attacks, your opponent can't play combat cards for that turn.
"Now that his raiders are starting to trust me, I'm almost close enough to kill him." --Toris

name: Fighter-for-Hire
effect: "The downfall of all warlords, not realizing their boundaries." --Caesar

name: Flaming Arrows
effect: Discard 6 cards from your opponent's deck.
"I'll torch the place with everyone inside it." --Draco

name: Flying Daggers
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's attacking or blocking characters with power 3 or less and discard it.
"Would you kill a mosquito with an axe?" --Lao Ma

name: Frying Pan Assault
effect: Give 1 of your blocked or blocking characters +3 power for this turn.
"This was our only frying pan. Why do you do that? You have weapons, don't you?" --Gabrielle

name: Furies' Madness
effect: Discard 2 cards at random from your opponent's hand (1 if he or she only has 1 card).
"What were they going to do to him for killing his mother? There was no way out for him." --The Keeper

name: Gabby's Little Stick
effect: Give each of your attacking or blocking characters +1 power for this turn.
". . .with Gabby as his sidekick, fighting with her little stick." --Joxer the Mighty"

name: Gabrielle
effect: Unique. Once during your turn, whenever you're allowed to play an action card, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters with power 4 or less and tap it.

name: Gabrielle Misleads
effect: Tap all of your opponent's characters.

name: Gabrielle's Orders
effect: Play only when attacking with any unblocked characters. Give each of those characters +1 power for this turn. Draw a card.

name: Gallic Slave
effect: When this card is put in play, draw a card.

name: Gate Guards
effect: Blocker (This character can't attack)
"You're not getting in. . . So be smart and walk away while you still can."

name: Ghostly Messenger
effect: When this card is put in play, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your opponent's deck and put them on either the top or the bottom of his or her deck in any order.

name: Gift of the Gods
effect: Put any action card from your discard pile into your hand.
"I'll be most appreciative." --Ares

name: Greek Fighter
effect: "Zagreus heard you were in the area and sent us to stop you before you got in his way." --Largo

name: Hammer Lock
effect: Draw a card. You may also choose 1 of your opponent's characters and tap it.

name: Helen of Troy
effect: Unique. If this character is in play at the end of each of your opponent's turn, discard each of his or her characters in play that didn't attack that turn.

effect: When this card is put in play, discard 2 cards from your own deck. Fearsome (No character with power 3 or less can block this one)

name: Horde Leader
effect: Fearsome (No character with power 3 or less can block this one)

name: Horde Squad
effect: When this card is put in play, you may choose 1 of your opponent's resources in play and discard it.

name: Inside Man
effect: Whenever this character attacks, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters in play. That character can't block for that turn.

name: Jolly Ol' Toymaker
effect: When this card is put in play, you may choose up to 2 of your opponent's characters and tap them.

name: Knight of the Pierced Heart
effect: "They're working against the banshees. . . I think." --Xena

name: Left for Dead
effect: Put any character card from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Legbreaker

name: Little Baby Godling
effect: This character can't be blocked.

name: Lizard Warriors
effect: When this card is put in play, if you have any cards in your hand, discard 1 of them at random.

name: Longbow Archers
effect: When this card is put in play, discard 1 card from your opponent's deck.

name: Looking for Wounds
effect: Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your opponent's deck.

name: Lynch Mob
effect: When this card is put in play, discard 2 cards from your own deck.

name: Major Jealousy Rage
effect: Play only when attacking. Give 1 attacking, unblocked characters +4 power for this turn.
"Yes, the lust thing." --Aphrodite

name: Meleager the Mighty
effect: Unique. If this character is your only character in play at the end of your turn, discard it.

name: Mischief
effect: Play only when attacking. Choose 1 blocking character and return it to its player's hand.

effect: When this card is put in play, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck and rearrange them as you like.

name: Mystic Tutor

name: Nothing Is Impossible
effect: Give each of your attacking or blocking characters +5 power for this turn. Discard each of those characters still in play at the end of this turn.

name: Overprotective Father
effect: "No one humiliates my son and gets away with it." --King Lynaeus

name: Pacified
effect: Play only when attacked. Draw a card. You may also choose 1 attacking, unblocked character. When this combat resolves, that character doesn't discard cards from your deck.

effect: Discard all of the cards in your hand, then draw twice that many cards.

name: Poseidon's Whirlpool
effect: Discard all green characters in play (even your own).

name: Priest of the Furies
effect: "You've heard about the bounty, I take it." --Lysis
